Articles.Content:
Hi, I have quite a problem, especially with planets. I just downloaded the Sylandro planet warehouse and used it to create muy own planetary system, but when i tried to create my own planet, when I loaded my save, all I saw was space, without Kerbin, and without anything to click on. Then I tried to delete the new planet data, anda the game runned as usual.

Does anyone know what happened? I used Kopernicus año the 1.0.4 version of the game.

Also, I have another problem with planets. When I try to use the Kopernicus Examples gas giant Bastion, it just apears a big, white ball.

Does anybody know why all this is happening?

Help please!

When I have some answers, I'll try to make mods by myself istead of moddyfying other people's work. I'll be a good Kerbal moder!

Here you can find what you're looking for. If you still have issues, ask in the Kopernicus thread, someone will help you.

 

http://outer-planets.wikia.com/wiki/Outer_Planets_Wiki
